
```{r}
#| label: setup
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
library(ViewPipeSteps)
```



```{r}
#| oaged.print: false
print(
  filter(flights, month == 1, day == 1),
  n = 5, 
  width = 70
  )
```

```{r}
#| oaged.print: false
print(
flights |> 
  filter(month == 1, day == 1),
  )
```

```{r}
#| oaged.print: false
flights |>
  filter(month == 1, day == 1) |> 
  print(n = 5)
```

```{r}
#| paged.print: false
flights |> 
filter( 
  month == 1, 
  day %in% c(1, 15, 30)
  ) |> 
  slice_sample(n = 10) |> 
  arrange(desc(day), desc(dep_time))
```
```{r}
#| paged.print: false
set.seed(42)
flights |> 
filter(
```
